title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses a report detailing the downfall of Baker Mayfield with the Browns and why it appears the success of Odell Beckham Jr. with the Rams was the final blow. He believes it's for this NFL team to stop waiting and go all in on their new franchise quarterback. He also predicts the 3 NFL teams who will underperform expectations and the 1 team who's ready to contend right now. Plus, Michael Jordan's long-time agent, David Falk, joins the show to tell Colin how the Lakers should approach the offseason with an aging LeBron James. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
